title: FS: T206 Raws - Lajoie/Evers Portraits - Del Howard/Pat Moran Buybacks
author: npa589

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Raws - Lajoie/Evers Portraits - Del Howard/Pat Moran Buybacks
posts.post_content:
Prices are as delivered. - If you want enlarged scans, just send me an e-mail (npa589@yahoo.com) and you'll get them within 10 minutes. Photobucket is acting silly today, so html code wasn't working for the cards I just added. 

E-mails take precedence over pm. [url]npa589@yahoo.com[/url]

T206 Yellow Chance isn't for sale.

T206 Evers Portrait Piedmont 150 - Faint creases on 3 of the corners, faint crease across card. $100

T206 Lajoie Portrait Sweet Cap 150 - . This one could grade a 3 if the grader was nice, but is more likely a 2.5. I had a Speaker very similar to this grade a 2.5. Same type of crease. There are also faint pencil lines starting on left and going diagonally. I'm afraid to erase them, but I know there are people who know how to do that without damaging the card.  $175

T206 Buybacks: Pat Moran and Del Howard - 70$ for both.



T206 Joe Tinker Portrait - probably Fair. 75$ SOLD
T205 Eddie Cicotte - VG to VG+ - No creases, rounded corners - 100$ SOLD



[IMG]http://i1185.photobucket.com/albums/z356/npa589/nap%20cubs/lajoiechancetinkereversoverallsteinfeldtportraits_0001.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1185.photobucket.com/albums/z356/npa589/nap%20cubs/lajoiechancetinkereversoverallsteinfeldtportraits_0002.jpg[/IMG]

I'll take the Red please Nate.

[url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]
Red is Steves, Griffith and Wheat sold to Todd.
added 2 cards for sale (del howard/pat moran)
Chance and Mitchell sold - Thanks Pat
